doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Shafiqul Islam

He is a Professor & Head, Orthopedic Surgery at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Good Health Hospital, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Shafiqul Islam at Good Health Hospital, Rangpur is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
